title: Victoria Prentis – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Victoria Prentis, the Conservative MP for North Oxfordshire, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
Once again, I’m backing Rishi Sunak to be Prime Minister.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

Rishi has what it takes to lead us through difficult times. We have seen him act in the nation’s interest under pressure before. He understands we must beat inflation.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

I know he will bring our country and party together.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
